personal_information.name: Database Administrator
personal_information.location: CCA Global Partners, St. Louis, MO

professional_summary: Experienced Database Administrator with expertise in managing MSSQL and MongoDB environments, focusing on performance tuning, data correction, backup management, requirements gathering, and SSIS development.

key_responsibilities: Manage a database environment of 15+ production MSSQL servers and 1 MongoDB server.
Perform database performance tuning and monitoring.
Enhance end users' understanding of database systems through training and documentation.
Automate data-modification systems to meet business needs.
Assist in migration from local datacenter to AWS.

education.degree: Master of Science in Information Technology in Database Systems
